img.div:
What
COVID-19 School Closure
When
5/7/2020
On April 1, Governor Brian Kemp ordered all Georgia K-12 schools to remain closed through the end of the 2019-20 school year, in an effort to fight the ongoing battle against the novel coronavirus pandemic.
Valdosta City Schools will remain closed through May 29. If we see that the closure needs to be extended, we will immediately share that information via our web and social media sites as well as local media outlets.
All events listed on our calendars through May 29 are canceled or postponed until further notice unless otherwise noted.
